title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1220.30 - Permission required to bring into or carry firearms or other weapons in terminal; exceptions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1220.30 - Permission required to bring into or carry firearms or other weapons in terminal; exceptions

State Regulations

No persons, except authorized law-enforcement officers, post-office, customs and express employees, licensed armed guards, employees of
a carrier, and members of the armed services of the United States or of any

State thereof on official duty, shall bring into or carry in the terminal any
firearms or other weapons, without permission. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1220.30

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
